tool_description: Long term credit scores for 8 million companies
name: Business Credit Scores
title: Business Credit Scores

api_list.name: Credit score by name, city and/or state
api_list.description: Look up credit scores for private companies that do not have a ticker symbol. Almost 8 million companies available. Try searching by city and state first, then look for a name match.

api_list.name: Credit score by ticker
api_list.description:
Provide a ticker and receive a score: 1- 10. 
1 is the best and 10 is the worst.

api_list.name: Distinct Tickers
api_list.description: Get list of tickers for which credit scores exist.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://business-credit-scores.p.rapidapi.com/aggregate/creditScores"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "business-credit-scores.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://business-credit-scores.p.rapidapi.com/aggregate/creditScores"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "business-credit-scores.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
